title: Data Corruption
body: Has been happening a lot recently. I'll load up into a game, then mid way through the loading screen I'll get a bug splat and will continue to get them until I restart the game, where it will then inform me, "Data corruption detected. Repair recommended" Something along those lines. It forces me to get to the game late/leaver buster if a remake was possible (Most of the time it isn't.) since I'm stuck repairing the darn thing.  Please help me out, I don't want to get banned or restricted because this is affecting me AND my teammates if I cannot connect to the match in time.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are the results of a few potential issues. The most common are system drivers or hardware issues, so I'd recommend working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address these common culprits.

If you continue to experience these bugsplats after taking those steps, please let me know.

Thanks for getting back to me. I figured out the problem shortly after I made this post(Forgot to come back here and update). One of my RAM sticks were faulty (Which is why the game was bugsplatting/currupting/pc bsod) I've since removed the stick and am just running one of them (I have  2x8gbs so I'm good until I get it replaced.)

 But while we're here, You know the transition from accepting the game > see the roles on the map > champion select? The animations aren't showing up for me. I'm just seeing a still picture of SR then the champion select pops up. Think you can help with this one? Thanks again!

Hmm.. I'd recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of League's files in case this is caused by missing assets in the game. Is this happening on the legacy (current) client or on the Beta/Alpha Client?
